verses.content: Chuongchun, nangni laia kohran upahai chu, kei, in upatpui, Krista tuornahai hretu, ropuina hung inlang ding chang vetu ding hin kân fui cheu.
Nangni laia Pathien Pâwlhai chu enkawl ro. Thaw ding a ni lei ni loin, Pathien thu anga inhâwk pum lemin, hlêpna tirdakum dit lei ni loin, lungrila inhâwktak lemin,
in chanhai chungah insuklal bawk loin, pâwlhai enkhi dingin insiem lemin inrawi ro.
Chun, Berâm Vêngtu Laltak chu a hung inlang pha, ropuina lallu- khum chuoi thei naw chu hmûng in tih.

Chuong ang bawkin, nangni tleirâwl deuhai, upahai kuomah intuklût ro. Anih, in rêngin rawng inbâwltuo seng dingin thuhnuoirawl- nain inthuom ro; Pathienin chapohai a kal a, inngaitlâwmhai ruok chu lunginsietna a pêk hlak sih a.
Chuleiin, a huntaka chun a chawimawi theina ding cheuin, Pathien kut hrâttak hnuoia chun insukhnuoi unla,
amain a ngaisak hlak cheu leiin in lunginzîngna po po ama chungah innghat vawng ro.
Ngaiven unla, fimkhur ro; in khingpui Diebol chu sakeibaknei inrûm hlak angin a fâk thei ding zawngin ân vêl ruoi hlak a nih.
In unau khawvêla umhai chunga chun chuong anga tuorna chu a tlung ve a nih ti hrein, awi dettaka umin, ama chu do ro.
Chun, lunginsietna po po Pathien, a chatuon ropuina chang dinga Kristaa kotu cheu chun, sâwt nawtê in tuor hnungin siemṭha famkimin, sukdetin, sukhrât a ti cheu.
Ama kuoma chun rorêlna chu chatuonin um raw se. Amen.
Ka unaupa ringumtaka ka iruot Silvan kuta hin, nangni infui le, chu chu Pathien lunginsietna tak tak a nih ti inhriettirin, tawitêin in kuomah ka ziek a nih; chuonga chun ngîr det ro.
Babulona um, nangni anga thlangnu hin chibai a bûk cheu; chuong ang bawkin ka naupa Marka khawmin chibai a bûk cheu.
Hmangaina fâwpa fâwpin chi- bai inbûk ro. Nangni laia Kristaa um taphawt kuoma chun inremna um raw se.
